inclusion.criterion: received a new prescription for an antidepressant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recruited from families receiving care at Nationwide Children's Hospital or Community Physician Practices affiliated with Nationwide Children's Hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Families who speak do not speak English
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: families with children who are actively psychotic
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16, but otherwise healthy.
